app_descript:
Express Plus Medicare

Brief: Express Plus Medicare is the official Australian Government app for managing Medicare services. It's designed to help Australians easily access a range of Medicare-related services directly from their mobile devices, including submitting claims for COVID-19 vaccine-related injuries and proving vaccination status.
